Name: My Best Nightmare
About the game: My Best Nightmare is the Point & Click quest about the first day of work at a custom dream-making company, which very quickly turns into hell. An adventure full of riddles, plot twists, and unusual locations. Get inside the head of a mentally ill man and find out what caused his ailment. Find items and use them to advance further. Read character dialogues and immerse yourself in a story with multiple endings. Feel the unfriendliness of the world you find yourself in.
